resources.string: The horse is a domesticated perissodactyl mammal of the Equidae family.
Very small bird, brightly plumaged and brightly coloured, very long and fine bill.
Feline mammal of generally small size, flexible body, round head.
A feline mammal about 250 to 400 cm long (including tail), with a tawny-yellow coat.
Medium-sized canid mammal, slender body, robust and somewhat short legs.
